sentences.english: My chess has improved a lot.

sentences.english: If we are able to learn, it we'll just increase the level of our mastership .

sentences.english: He's just too good at chess – countless people have lost to him.
sentences.chinese: 他的棋艺实在太高，多少人败在他的手下。

sentences.english: He always feels like a sovereign descending to the world in front of the chess board.
sentences.chinese: 小明精通棋艺，面对棋盘他总有种君临天下的感觉。

sentences.english: My chess ability was roughly at the limit.
His skill in chess is unmatched in the school.
sentences.chinese: 他的棋艺在全校是独一无二的。

sentences.english: France and China Law edge below Yamamoto examine the characteristics of chess.
